authorAttributions.displayName: SpeechRise Inc., Nicole Dobranski, M.S. CCC-SLP
SpeechRise Inc., Nicole Dobranski, M.S. CCC-SLP

adrFormatAddress: 232 E 78th St, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: Nicole has been my child's SLP for the past 5 years.  She clicked right away with my child and knew how to motivate her in the most fun way.  My child is always happy to have a session with Nicole and loves the different games they play to help her improve her speech and language skills.  Nicole has also been fantastic with coordinating with my child's home room teachers at her school to tie in some of the classroom skills into her own sessions.  Helping to support my child in the best possible way.  I trust her completely and feel so lucky that we found her early on.  She is very hardworking, upbeat, energetic and positive.  I highly recommend her services!

text.text: Nicole has been my child's SLP for the past 5 years.  She clicked right away with my child and knew how to motivate her in the most fun way.  My child is always happy to have a session with Nicole and loves the different games they play to help her improve her speech and language skills.  Nicole has also been fantastic with coordinating with my child's home room teachers at her school to tie in some of the classroom skills into her own sessions.  Helping to support my child in the best possible way.  I trust her completely and feel so lucky that we found her early on.  She is very hardworking, upbeat, energetic and positive.  I highly recommend her services!

originalText.text: Nicole has been working with my son for a little over a year and the improvements are incredible! But it's not just with his his speech, his confidence, self-esteem, and social skills have also soared. He looks forward to working with, or as he sees it, playing with, Nicole every week. He says he wishes he could see her everyday. When we had to go virtual, Nicole seamlessly moved her lessons to full remote and was still able to keep my son fully engaged and interested (and he was only three at the time of the shutdown). When Nicole is able to go in-person into my son's school, all of the other children get so excited to see her. She is truly amazing and has a warmth and authenticity about her that everyone senses. The progress she has made with my son is undeniable. We feel so lucky to be working with her and highly recommend her to everyone!

originalText.text: Nicole has worked with both my son (4) and daughter (7). They have both made big improvements over their time working with her and enjoyed every second of it. Nicole is thoughtful in her approach and tailors the work to each child's interests. In fact, my son likes it so much he recently asked if she could see her twice a week! We are so grateful for Nicole.

We are so grateful for Nicole.

originalText.text: Nicole is a wonderful speech pathologist.  She is the perfect mix of kind but firm and completely engaged our 7 year old son during each weekly session held over 9 months.  During that time he mastered the skills that we were focused on and as a result therapy was no longer needed.  We were very sad to part ways with Nicole!  We recommend Nicole without hesitation!

text.text: Nicole is a wonderful speech pathologist.  She is the perfect mix of kind but firm and completely engaged our 7 year old son during each weekly session held over 9 months.  During that time he mastered the skills that we were focused on and as a result therapy was no longer needed.  We were very sad to part ways with Nicole!  We recommend Nicole without hesitation!

originalText.text: I hired Nicole to assist me in creating programming for call center staff. They run a marathon each day with their voice muscles. She created interactive programming which provided tips as to how to care for the voice, excercise to warm up and even some advanced techniques for those experiencing vocal cord nodules. This helps our adult participants sound  confident, even under pressure, go home less stressed and increase their productivity. Nicole is professional, caring, ethical and hard working.
